title: WTB: C46 cards, especially Gandil, Taylor

posts.post_title: WTB: C46 cards, especially Gandil, Taylor
posts.post_content:
Currently, I'm hoping to buy any c46's that I can find not in great condition. I have a budget as always so I am looking for lesser conditioned cards. I would really like to find a Gandil or Taylor in rough condition to start off with!

Thanks
Travis
